name: Rush 24hr Delivery
description: Prioritized turnaround with delivery in 24 hours where available.

name: Extra Revision Round
description: Add one additional revision round beyond the standard included edits.

name: Extended Length (+2 min)
description: Extend your custom song by up to two additional minutes.

name: Instrumental Version
description: Receive an instrumental-only version for performances and content use.

name: Stem Files
description: Get separated stems for flexible mixing, editing, or live playback.

name: Custom Cover Art
description: Original custom cover artwork designed specifically for your song.

name: Lyric Video
description: A simple lyric video synchronized to your finished track.

name: Commercial License
description: Rights for approved business and commercial usage of your track.
